concept.title: 52.233-4 Applicable Law for Breach of Contract Claim.

conbody.p: As prescribed in 33.215(b), insert the following clause:
Applicable Law for Breach of Contract Claim (Oct 2004)
United States law will apply to resolve any claim of breach of this contract.
